arts.ttl: Odysseas Vlachodimos transfer stance after Newcastle United exit rejected
arts.sum: The former Forest goalkeeper had the chance to depart on loan just weeks after arriving at St James' Park but remained on Tyneside to battle for first-team minutes. With Nick Pope set to return from a knee injury in the near future, there is a slight chance Vlachodimos could depart should an attractive offer arrive for both player and club.

arts.ttl: Preview: Al Ittihad vs. Al Shabab - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Saudi Pro League clash between Al Ittihad and Al Shabab, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
